application_description: Actimize Xceed is a web application that hosts the Xceed ACHRDFI, ACHODFI, Wires, Online for Retail and Commercial
embedded_ai_description: Nice Actimize Xceed incorporates AI technologies, specifically highlighting self-learning capabilities that autonomously adapt to new threats in financial crime, indicating a strong reliance on machine learning.

application_description: The Bank is looking to engage in an outsourced agreement with Ready Capital, whereby they would provide underwriting services for SBA loan applications. Ready Capital's iBusiness software platform will provide a portal which will support SBA loan underwriting and approval processes.
embedded_ai_description: LenderAI enables banks and lenders to streamline their SBA origination process from sales all the way through servicing. Our technology leverages interpretable, auditable, and traceable artificial intelligence to assess the likelihood of approval and predict emerging financial distress based on a comprehensive view of a bank's data.
